pricingPage.metaTitle: Treatment Pricing — Compare Costs Across 4 Countries | MyChinaMed
pricingPage.metaDescription: Compare medical treatment prices in China, USA, South Korea, and Thailand. Save up to 70% on dental implants, LASIK, IVF, cardiac surgery, and more.
pricingPage.title: Compare Treatment Costs Worldwide
pricingPage.subtitle: See how much you can save by choosing top-tier hospitals in China — prices sourced from real hospital data.
pricingPage.disclaimer: Prices are estimates based on average costs in USD. Actual prices may vary depending on hospital, doctor, complexity, and individual case. China prices are sourced from partner hospitals.
pricingPage.whyTitle: Why Choose China for Medical Treatment?
pricingPage.why1: World-class hospitals with JCI accreditation and Grade III-A certification — the same standards as top Western medical centers, at a fraction of the cost.
pricingPage.why2: Cutting-edge technology including robotic surgery, CAR-T cell therapy, and AI-assisted diagnostics — often available faster than in Western countries with shorter wait times.
pricingPage.why3: Dedicated international patient departments with multilingual coordinators, airport pickup, hotel arrangement, and 24/7 support throughout your stay.
pricingPage.ctaTitle: Ready to Save on Your Treatment?
pricingPage.ctaDesc: Get a personalized quote with exact pricing from our partner hospitals. Our service is 100% free.

reviewsPage.metaDescription: Read real patient stories from around the world. See how international patients saved money and received world-class care at Chinese hospitals.

reviewsPage.sampleDisclaimer: These testimonials represent sample patient experiences. Individual results may vary. All reviews will be verified and sourced from real patients.
reviewsPage.ctaDesc: Start your medical journey with a free consultation. We'll match you with the best hospital for your needs.
